page.title: 03HOME LIFE(ADULTS)CALCOT,RDG
page.content: In the Calcot area increasing numbers of women are going out to work,either full time or part time.This has caused problems with some families. Divorces and separations have increased in recent years.However,with other families two incomes have led to increased freedoms and activities which have cemented relationships. Homes now contain many appliances which make work easier-cookers,washing -machines,refrigeraters,and deep freezers.Men are taking an increasing role in household duties.To own a car is now commonplace.Families enjoy greater mobility,not only for visiting,but also for eating out at restaurants,and for entertainment.Most people now have a holiday away from their home,with larger numbers going abroad on 'package holidays'.
